Group.Description: Group assignment based on responses to observing touch videos.

Vicarious_touches.Description: Number of trials with reported tactile sensation.

Hand_touches.Description: Number of trials with sensation on one or both hands.

Both_hands.Description: Number of trials with sensation on both hands.

Left_hand.Description: Number of trials with sensation on the left hand.

Right_hand.Description: Number of trials with sensation on the right hand.

Finger.Description: Number of trials with sensation on the finger.

V1_Feel_touch.Description: Whether the participant experienced a tactile sensation while watching video 1.

V1_Sensation.Description: Comma-separated list of sensation categories for video 1.

V1_Sensation_text.Description: Free-text description of the sensation(s) for video 1.

V1_Category.Description: How the sensation felt for video 1 (Neutral/Pleasant/Unpleasant/Painful).

V1_Where.Description: Comma-separated list of body locations for video 1.
